3. Meiotic expansion - This refers to the expansion of repeat units in the gene during meiosis, the process by which gametes (sperm or egg cells) are formed.
4. Mitotic expansion - This refers to the expansion of repeat units in the gene during mitosis, the process by which cells divide and replicate their DNA.
